comments.comment:
No doubt Malinga...ur a talented guy....most people know about it ....Sri Lanka as World...but unfortunately some foolish people in Sri Lanka Specially our politicians do not your value of you.

We know your contribution that gave us to Sri Lanka Cricket...Malinga it's time to say good bye to our cricket...because still  there is no issue of your talent...but one man's contribution is not sufficient to win a match.Its a Team Work.

Remember the date 10th July 2019 India vs New Zealand...The game won by New Zealand...when compare the Teams between India and New Zealand at the moment...still we all say India is best...It reflects the ODI ranking also..

But when you watch the match...that match is whole Team effort by New Zealand..

Same thing happen 1996 World Cup final between Sri Lanka vs Australia...

comments.comment: Attatama Haren Fernando kiyana pakayaa oya putuven elavalaa daana ona, uta vatinaakamak thiyenava kandaayama rata venuven loka kusalathaavakata gohin ena vita oyta vadaa honda kreedakayinta santhosha saha diri ganeema vena vidiyata piliganeeme kramayak sakas karanna. Vatichcha ekaata gona anna vaage kollo tikata, unta kohomada varadi kiyanne, paalakayonta kandaayamata sudusu kreedakayan thoranna danne nathi kota, balance team ekak thibune naha kiyala api okkoma dakka, daksha pandu yaveeme kreedakayo naha, batting vala kadulle randila lakun  ras kara ganeemata dakshathaavaya adu heyin thamaa visin kadulla davaaganna hati hondin penuna, ekiyanne varada megollava puhunu karapu nathi HATHURUSINGHA vani salli valatama saha bala loba kamata vada karana harak nisaaya. Selection committee eka bohoma durvalai, evaagema cricket board ekath gonnu inne, therenne naha honda puhunu karuwekva ganna, ema danuma ung ekettavath nathi heyin uda inna paalakayange prashnaya kandaayamatama bala paanava. balance kandaayamak apita naha. Me hethu kandaayamath hondin dannava. Vena rataval vala maadyaval ema kreedavatama adaala viseshakna maadia vedin thamai prashna karanne adaala kreedakayangen, mehe inna buuruvo nila masso interview karana evun.
comments.author: Raj Warnakulasuriya

comments.comment: Wede hariyata krnne natiwa awith madyata,prekshakayata sadda dala wedak na.eken porak wenna gihin tamai Kusal Mendiswa ada godak wiwechanaya wenne.Mali wede godak durata hariyata karapu bawa atta eth minissuth ekka tarahayen wage kata karala terumak na.Prekshakayo innakan witarai onima kenekuta market ekak tienne.ubala digin digatama paradila kujeetha wela enakota mal mala danna minissunta pissuwak na.e gena prashna kr aithiyak minissunta tiyanawa.mataka tiyaganna oya hamoma sadda danne 2007,2011 final paradila apu team ekath piligatta jathiyakata.Mali eka dannawa dannati unta kiala denna.

comments.comment: Ane ohoma uddachcha wenna epaa miniho...danagaththoth hondai , ape cricket tharu wana arjuna, sanga wage mahathun kawadaawath oya wage oluwen katha karala naa . Ithin thamanuth honda hakiyaawak thiyena , ea bawawa lokayata pennapu kenek. Ithin eya nihathamaaniwa bukthiwindagena katayuthu kaloth thamai thama rate saha loakawaasi prekshakainge aadaraya dinaaganna puluwann wenne nomiyena namak thabaa. Economically th obala oya thana labaagena inne loaka waasi prekshakainge sahaya nisaane. Cricket paalakaingeth loku waradi godak athi . Namuth ewa mewa wena wenama handunaganeemata hakiyaawa athikalagatha yuthui. Ithin oya media wala aya ahana prashna,  loaka waasi prekshakain sandahaath balapaanawa saha prekshakainta aithiyakuth thiyenawa ea wenuwen. Ehema neda. Nihathamaani weema thama health ekatath hondaine neda maali .,
